  • .vscode/settings.json * editor.codeActionsOnSave: { source.fixAll.eslint: true } * editor.formatOnSave: false * eslint.validate: [

    “javascript”, { “language”: “typescript”, “autoFix”: true }

    ] * prettier.eslintIntegration: true

  • .prettier.json * prettier –find-config-path * –no-editorconfig
